| HistoryText             = The Universal Cosa Nostrum is a multi-species intergalactic criminal organization. It is led by "Tribal Fathers" who have designated the planet Bedridden as a neutral location where the organization's "Circle" holds it meetings.{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 172}} They hired the ancient, nearly immortal mercenary [[Lunatik (Mercenary) (Earth-616)|Lunatik]] to find and retrieve for them the universe's most addictive drug (Addictum) which due to the [[Norrin Radd (Earth-616)|Silver Surfer]] he was unsuccessful.{{r|Marvel Comics Presents Vol 1 172|174}}
